updates.description: This feature allows users to send a large number of transactions to be processed at once, rather than individually.
updates.automation_value: Significantly reduces the time and manual work required to process transactions.
updates.business_impact: By allowing batch processing, users can automate the task of sending transactions for processing, leading to process improvements and time savings.

updates.description: Users can now schedule reports to be generated and sent to their email at specified intervals.
updates.automation_value: Saves users time by automating the task of report generation.
updates.business_impact: Users no longer need to manually generate and send reports, eliminating manual work and saving time.

updates.description: Users can now export data directly to Excel, where they can further analyze and manipulate the data.
updates.automation_value: Reduces the manual work required to transfer data to Excel for further analysis.
updates.business_impact: Users can now automate this task, saving them time and providing integration opportunities with Excel.

updates.description: This feature allows users to automate a series of tasks, such as generating a report, sending it to a specific email, and then archiving it.
updates.automation_value: Significantly reduces the time and manual work required to perform a series of tasks.
updates.business_impact: By allowing users to automate these tasks, they can save significant amounts of time and improve their processes.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: Axys 3.8.5
   Release Date: November 2023
   Description: This update introduced a new API endpoint for batch processing of transactions. This allows users to send a large number of transactions to be processed at once, rather than individually.
   Automation Value: This feature significantly reduces the time and manual work required to process transactions. By allowing batch processing, users can automate the task of sending transactions for processing.

2. Update Name: Axys 4.0
   Release Date: April 2024
   Description: Axys 4.0 introduced a new feature that allows for automated report generation. Users can now schedule reports to be generated and sent to their email at specified intervals.
   Automation Value: This feature saves users time by automating the task of report generation. Users no longer need to manually generate and send reports.

3. Update Name: Axys 4.1
   Release Date: September 2024
   Description: This update introduced a new integration with Microsoft Excel. Users can now export data directly to Excel, where they can further analyze and manipulate the data.
   Automation Value: This feature reduces the manual work required to transfer data to Excel for further analysis. Users can now automate this task, saving them time.

4. Update Name: Axys 4.2
   Release Date: February 2025
   Description: Axys 4.2 introduced a new workflow automation feature. This feature allows users to automate a series of tasks, such as generating a report, sending it to a specific email, and then archiving it.
   Automation Value: This feature significantly reduces the time and manual work required to perform a series of tasks. By allowing users to automate these tasks, they can save significant amounts of time.
